channel.title: INfinance

item.title: Why Apple and other slow AI adopters may be right to wait and see
item.description: Investors should not punish companies that are being cautious about adopting AI, a new study suggests.

item.title: Silver’s price has more than doubled in 4 years. There may be more room to rise.
item.description: History indicates the silver rally may have room to run, according to research firm SentimenTrader.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
